com.erudika.para.i18n

Class LanguageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erudika.para.i18n.LanguageUtils

  • @Singleton
public class LanguageUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for language operations. These can be used to build a crowdsourced translation system.
    Author:
    Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]
    See Also:
    Translation

        @Inject
public LanguageUtils(Search search,
                             DAO dao)
        Default constructor.

        dao - a core persistence instance

    • Method Detail

      • readLanguage

        public Map<String,String> readLanguage(String appid,
                                       String langCode)
        Returns a map of all translations for a given language. Defaults to the default language which must be set.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        Returns:
        the language map

      • writeLanguage

        public void writeLanguage(String appid,
                          String langCode,
                          Map<String,String> lang,
                          boolean writeToDatabase)
        Persists the language map in the data store. Overwrites any existing maps.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        lang - the language map
        writeToDatabase - true if you want the language map to be stored in the DB as well

      • getProperLocale

        public Locale getProperLocale(String langCode)
        Returns a non-null locale for a given language code.
        Parameters:
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        Returns:
        a locale. default is English

      • getDefaultLanguage

        public Map<String,String> getDefaultLanguage(String appid)
        Returns the default language map.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        Returns:
        the default language map or an empty map if the default isn't set.

      • setDefaultLanguage

        public void setDefaultLanguage(Map<String,String> deflang)
        Sets the default language map. It is the basis language template which is to be translated.
        Parameters:
        deflang - the default language map

      • getDefaultLanguageCode

        public String getDefaultLanguageCode()
        Returns the default language code.
        Returns:
        the 2-letter language code

      • setDefaultLanguageCode

        public void setDefaultLanguageCode(String langCode)
        Sets the default language code.
        Parameters:
        langCode - the 2-letter language code

      • readAllTranslationsForKey

        public List<Translation> readAllTranslationsForKey(String appid,
                                                   String locale,
                                                   String key,
                                                   Pager pager)
        Returns a list of translations for a specific string.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        locale - a locale
        key - the string key
        pager - the pager object
        Returns:
        a list of translations

      • getApprovedTransKeys

        public Set<String> getApprovedTransKeys(String appid,
                                        String langCode)
        Returns the set of all approved translations.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        Returns:
        a set of keys for approved translations

      • getTranslationProgressMap

        public Map<String,Integer> getTranslationProgressMap(String appid)
        Returns a map of language codes and the percentage of translated string for that language.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        Returns:
        a map indicating translation progress

      • getAllLocales

        public Map<String,Locale> getAllLocales()
        Returns a map of all language codes and their locales.
        Returns:
        a map of language codes to locales

      • approveTranslation

        public boolean approveTranslation(String appid,
                                  String langCode,
                                  String key,
                                  String value)
        Approves a translation for a given language.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        key - the translation key
        value - the translated string
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful

      • disapproveTranslation

        public boolean disapproveTranslation(String appid,
                                     String langCode,
                                     String key)
        Disapproves a translation for a given language.
        Parameters:
        appid - appid name of the App
        langCode - the 2-letter language code
        key - the translation key
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful
